name: Super Spaceship Wars
description:
Super Spaceship Wars is a whole new experience in spaceship arcades.

Its main objective is to bring a fast-paced gaming experience to unexperienced and skillful players alike by changing the difficulty dynamically, keeping you at the edge of your seat in a rewarding state of psychological flow.

Top features include:

* Dynamic adaptive difficulty!

* Full movement control, including rotation.
* Fast-paced action.
* Infinite map.
* Five different kinds of enemies with inherent behaviors.
* Procedurally generated bosses.
* Three different leaderboard categories, to fit your skills.
* And more...
